entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 0.3°C

entry.title: Monday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers becoming mixed with flurries near midnight. Snow level 1100 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
